name: aurora-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
